posts.description:
Have you heard about my 10/10/10 Beginner Yoga Challenge (swipe left)? Starting tomorrow, I'm challenging anyone who has ever wanted to start a yoga practice to try 10 minutes a day for 10 days and I will teach you 10 yoga poses!üí™üèª
_
I created a beginner plan on Omstars.com (link in bio) for you to follow along... just 10 min a day!! I promise you will be inspired to begin a yoga practice! 
_

Tomorrow, DAY 1 of #mayibeginwithten is Downward Facing Dog. 
TIPS:
1. Hands and feet shoulder width apart. 
2. Start in plank and lift hips up as you press your heart towards your feet. 
3. Gaze at navel or knees. 
4. Pull shoulders down and back and pull ribs in. 
_
This challenge is for ANYONE - beginners to advanced students! In fact, if you practice yoga, please TAG someone to join this challenge with you! 
Help me spread the word!üôèüèª
_
Prizes for all who post for all 10 days from @omstarsofficial including a @liforme Omstars Red Yoga mat and a @yogaprowheel! Remember to tag me and @omstarsofficial in your daily posts!
_
Subscribe to my online videos including my "Begin With 10" plan by clicking the link in my bio! Use "101010" and your first month is just $10. 
Cancel anytime. 
www.Omstars.com üëàüèª
_
What are you waiting for? START YOGA TODAY!üôåüèª

Just arrived home. I'm happy to see my family but I think I left a piece of my heart in Eleuthera ... #island #dancer #missingeleuthera 
Photo by: @inlovewithbeachyogagirl during last nights epic sunset.

I'm an artist, a dreamer, an optimist, and I believe in the miraculous. I have experienced profound things that have no factual basis and make no logical sense. These experiences have shaped my reality of what is possible and how exciting life can be. I don't know all the answers but honestly the quest for truth has lead me to the most magical places and I've met the most amazing people. I will forever seek and always be a student. üôèüèª
_
Day 21 Final day of our #effectivehandstands challenge. I'm so happy so many of you took the challenge and joined us on Omstars.com. Thank you to my bestie and partner @kinoyoga - I miss you! Please follow us and @omstarsofficial for updates on our new subscription site. 
_
My new beginner challenge starts Monday. Check out yesterday's post!
_
If you participated in all 21 days, leave me a comment so we can choose winners!
#lighthousepoint #eleuthera

Stopped by my favorite rock today.‚ô•Ô∏è
#lighthousepoint #eleuthera #beachyogagirlretreat

Day 20 #effectivehandstands is HANDSTAND or finding the vertical line! Feel free to use a wall or modify how you need. Things to remember:
1. Squeeze glutes 
2. Elevate shoulders 
3. Lock shoulder and elbow 
4. Point toes and engage legs 
5. Draw the belly in

Join us on Omstars.com for the full handstand course. 
Tag @beachyogagirl @kinoyoga and @omstarsofficial in your posts. #handstand

Only honor and respect for this amazing earth we live on. üåè 
#eleuthera #sea #ocean

I've been blessed today by 17 of the most gracious and awesome people on this retreat. It's so amazing how quickly we bond and become like a family. Today was perfect and I'm so grateful and thankful for this opportunity.üôèüèª
_

Day 19 Straddle Handstand #effectivehandstands. This handstand shape can be practiced in headstand if you aren't ready to leave the wall. Watch our full course on Omstars.com (link in bio) to follow along with @kinoyoga and me!
@omstarsofficial 
Use "wearelive" to get your first month for $5!

When I was younger I never thought I could achieve anything I wanted. I didn't believe I'd ever find happiness or feel content with my life or who I was.  I suffered from low self esteem and battled depression most of my early life. I became disillusioned with the idea of "happily ever after" because I had only experienced pain & struggle. Somewhere however, deep down inside, I knew that if I kept looking, I'd find what it was that I was seeking. üôèüèª
#peace #happiness #purpose #eleuthera

I believe in magical places where time stands still and you can become one with the Divine. Eleuthera is that place for me. I'm blessed to be here & blessed to be able to share my passions with others. Feeling so grateful today. üôèüèª
_
Day 18 #effectivehandstands is Titibhasana. This pose definitely will help build your wrist and arm strength for handstands. Don't worry about straightening the legs. Keep them bent if hamstrings are tight! Remember to follow @kinoyoga @beachyogagirl and @omstarsofficial ü§∏‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. _
Still time to subscribe to our new site Omstars.com and join our 21 day Handstand Course! Use "wearelive" and your first month is $5!

Good morning from Eleuthera! I think is going to be an awesome day.üòäüåÖ
#beachyogagirlretreat

Eleuthera has the most amazing sunsets! I love this island so much. It feels like home each time I'm here. If you want to see more, watch my stories. I can't wait for tomorrow - My guests will arrive for my 4th annual Bahamas yoga retreat. So excited to meet everyone! #magichour
_

Day 17 #effectivehandstands 
@omstarsofficial @kinoyoga - tomorrow is Tuck Handstand! We are coming close to the end of our challenge! Are you still with us? Are you following our handstand course on omstars.com? Leave me a comment and let me know! 
_

Click the link in my bio to subscribe. First month is $5 - use "wearelive". #handstand #eleuthera
#beachyogagirlretreat

Yesterday while on a date with my husband, I got hit with one of the worst migraines of my life. Since we weren't home, I couldn't do my little migraine hacks during the first 15 min of the visual aura (if you are familiar with migraines there is a window of 15 min where you see flashing lights and go partially blind before you get the migraine) so it was the first time in awhile I've actually had a full blown migraine. 
_

Not to be dramatic, but I thought my brain was swelling to the point I might actually die. For 5 hours I laid in a dark room and tried my best to sleep it off but who can sleep with that much pain? I couldn't post for #effectivehandstands which I have never missed posting for one of my challenges before but really, I didn't think anyone would care. 
_

Today, I'm in the "migraine hangover" stage as I call it where I have a bad headache, eyes are swollen, and I feel like I got hit by a truck. I have to figure out a way to stop these migraines because I can't live this way. 
_

So, before you give me all your suggestions just know that I've tried them ALL. I'm the kind of person that will try anything anyone tells me if it means I don't have to endure this pain anymore. Really though, right now I'm feeling so down and depressed about it because nothing has worked. 
_
If you get migraines or know anything that maybe has worked for others feel free to leave me a comment. üôèüèª Thank you for your continued love and support. I love you guys!

#migraine

Happy Earth day! We live on a gorgeous planet! üåé This image is from Eleuthera - my favorite place in the world. Can't wait to go back this Tuesday!ü§∏‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôèüèªüôåüèª #eleuthera #Bahamas #paradise
